      • getScore

      • updateY

        public void updateY(int level)
        Moves the player along the Y Axis.
        Parameters:
        level - passed in from Game to make the player move faster/slower.

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore(int level)
        Updates the score based on the level you're in. (I know, it's boring....) You are scored based on the level you are on. The Formula is score += score + level.
        Parameters:
        level - the games current level.

        public void moveDown()
